data.prayer: Father, bless the county of Linxia Hui with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Linxia Hui, Gansu, China
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 147,679 believers in Linxia Hui.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Linxia Hui, Gansu, China to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Linxia Hui words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Bonan people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Linxia Hui, Gansu, China. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 147,679 believers in the county of Linxia Hui the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the county of Linxia Hui a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

location.name: Linxia Hui
location.cities_list: Linxia Chengguanzhen, Madang, Bajiao, Zuogaiduoma, Qu’ao
location.cities_list_w_pop: Linxia Chengguanzhen (274,466), Madang (5,662), Bajiao (5,095), Zuogaiduoma (3,940), Qu’ao (2,868)
